words.name: system configuration
words.description: keyword to separate the internal system configuration

words.name: time
words.description: Time is the continued sequence of existence and events that occurs in an apparently irreversible succession from the past, through the present, into the future

words.name: automatic created years
words.description: the number of years around the current year created automatically

words.name: select
words.description: to group the system settings used for suggestions

words.name: useful number of selection entries
words.description: the max number of selection entries shown to the user at once; if there a more, the less important are shown if the user has pressed on 'more'

words.name: min. % of words in list to suggest the word for the next
words.description: minimal percentage of the same word in a list to assume the word for the next

words.name: number of user views to force freezing a zukunft.com view
words.description: system setting that defines the number of view by one user to automatically freeze the view for the user

words.name: database
words.description: An organized collection of data stored and accessed electronically

words.name: database update block size
words.description: the number of formulas that should be updated with one commit if no dependency calculations are expected

triples.name: system time settings
triples.description: to group the time related settings for this zukunft.com pod

triples.name: system selection settings
triples.description: the word select is used to group the selection related settings for this zukunft.com pod

triples.from: min. % of words in list to suggest the word for the next

triples.name: system display settings
triples.description: to group the view related settings for this zukunft.com pod

triples.from: number of user views to force freezing a zukunft.com view

triples.name: system database settings
triples.description: to group the database related system settings
